bill.summary:
Establishes in the Treasury the United States Postal Service Memorial Fund to be administered and managed by the U.S. Postal Service.
Directs that amounts in such Fund be paid to the families of Joseph Curseen, Jr. and Thomas Morris, Jr. of the U.S. Postal Service.
